fn.p: The estimated proportion of sites subject to purifying selection, neutral evolution (drift), and positive selection are denoted by p 0 , p 1, and p 2 respectively. Underlining denotes codons that correspond to antigen‚Äêbinding sites in humans (Brown et al. 1993); asterisks denote codons that are positively selected in passerines in general (Minias et al., 2018).
